name: explanatively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that explains something: We have tried to present the results explanatively. "I've just arrived," she added explanatively. Related word
explanativeCompare
explanatorily
More examplesFewer examplesShe added explanatively, "I do not have any children of my own, you see."The study explanatively examines the phenomenon of overtourism. This study explanatively evaluates the various healthcare options that are available in the region.The collected data will be analyzed explanatively at the end of the paper."We are here primarily to help, in any way you wish," he began explanatively.
